titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 2-(4-aminophenyl)-6-methylbenzothiazole-7-sulfonic acid.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/1/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1997, the duty on 2-(4-aminophenyl)-6-methylbenzothiazole-7-sulfonic acid.
